author: Andrew Wilks
title: Why Turkey is facing a steep curve of new coronavirus cases
description: With more than 18,000 infections reported, Turkey surpasses other G20 nations that discovered the virus weeks earlier.
content:
Ankara, Turkey - Since declaring its first coronavirus case three weeks ago, Turkey has recorded one of the steepest trajectories of new cases in the world, amid fears it could become a hot spot of the global pandemic.
The rapid rise in cases - 18,135 confir… [+5167 chars]
